item.title: 监督机构警告：卡尼将住宅建设翻番的承诺存疑
item.description: 加拿大预算监督机构估计，政府新成立的住房机构在五年内只能建造 2.6 万套住房，这与加拿大在未来十年内将住房建设翻一番的目标相去甚远。【原文：Canada’s budget watchdog estimates the government’s new housing agency will only build 26,000 homes over five years, leaving the country far from its target of doubling housing construction over the next decade.】

item.title: 据说 Notion 正在考虑以 120 亿美元估值进行要约收购
item.description: 据知情人士透露，生产力软件公司 Notion 正在讨论让部分员工和早期投资者以约 120 亿美元的估值出售股票。【原文：Notion, a productivity software company, is in discussions to let some employees and early investors sell shares at a valuation of about $12 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 根斯勒表示，美国监管机构肯定会关注芝加哥商品交易所的故障问题
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会前主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）周二表示，美国监管机构将继续调查芝加哥商业交易所最近长达数小时的故障。【原文：US regulators will continue looking at the recent hours-long outage of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, former Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Gary Gensler said Tuesday.】

item.title: 午餐碗可能不是林黛玉的
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 股价上涨后，卡塔尔将出售 3.6 亿美元的森斯伯瑞公司股份
item.description: 卡塔尔主权财富基金计划出售价值约 2.73 亿英镑（约合 3.6 亿美元）的 J Sainsbury Plc 股份，标志着该超市最大股东的一次重大减持。【原文：Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund plans to sell a stake worth about £273 million ($360 million) in J Sainsbury Plc, marking a significant selldown by the supermarket’s largest shareholder.】

item.title: 康卡斯特寻求将 NBC 环球与华纳兄弟合并
item.description: 据熟悉康卡斯特公司计划的人士透露，康卡斯特公司正寻求将其 NBCUniversal 部门与华纳兄弟发现公司合并。【原文：Comcast Corp. is looking to merge its NBCUniversal division with Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., according to people familiar with the company’s plans.】

item.title: 美国 IPO 银行家费用在关门期间仍保持强劲增长，超过去年同期水平
item.description: 美国首次公开募股、股票销售和可转换债券的承销费已经超过了去年，尽管关税忧虑和政府停摆抑制了交易机会。【原文：Fees from underwriting US IPOs, stock sales and convertible bonds have already surpassed last year’s, even as tariff angst and the government shutdown curbed dealmaking opportunities.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔中央银行行长辞职，提前离任
item.description: 厄瓜多尔中央银行行长吉列尔莫-阿韦兰（Guillermo Avellán）周二宣布辞职，称他将在任期结束前一年多离职，以寻求其他职业机会。【原文：Ecuador central bank chief Guillermo Avellán announced his resignation Tuesday, saying he would leave the job more than a year before the end of his term to pursue other professional opportunities.】

item.title: 高盛 20 亿美元创新交易为 ETF 造就罕见的亿万富翁
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s decision to buy Innovator Capital Management in a deal worth $2 billion is delivering a massive payday to the exchange-traded fund issuer’s founders.】

item.title: 交易员竞相为美联储新主席的鸽派政策转变定价
item.description: 在权衡唐纳德-特朗普支持的美联储主席人选和一系列可能重塑经济前景的延迟数据的前景时，美国期货市场的交易商们正在博弈各种政策路径。【原文：Traders in US futures markets are gaming out a wide range of policy paths as they weigh the prospect of a Donald Trump–backed Federal Reserve chair and a raft of delayed data that could reshape the economic outlook.】

item.title: 芝加哥商品交易所称美国证券交易委员会批准建立国债和回购清算所
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团称，美国证券交易委员会已批准一家新的清算所注册，该清算所将促进遵守美国证券交易委员会即将出台的有关国库证券和回购交易的规定。【原文：CME Group Inc. said the US Securities and Exchange Commission has approved the registration of a new clearing house that will facilitate compliance with forthcoming SEC mandates for Treasury securities and repo transactions.】

item.title: ByteDance、Brookfield 被沃尔塔利亚公司求购巴西数据园区
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法国可再生能源供应商Voltalia SA正在巴西寻求数据中心项目，投资者包括TikTok所有者字节舞团有限公司（ByteDance Co Ltd.）和私募股权公司布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield Corp.）。【原文：French renewable energy provider Voltalia SA is pursuing data center projects in Brazil with investors including TikTok owner ByteDance Co Ltd. and private equity powerhouse Brookfield Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合国机构称，全球经济增长在 2026 年将面临持久性风险
item.description: 联合国机构在一份新报告中预测，由于贸易不确定性和地缘政治紧张局势，明年世界经济活动仍将 "低迷"，这些因素正在抑制人工智能以外的投资，并给政府财政带来压力。【原文：World economic activity will remain “subdued” next year amid trade uncertainty and geopolitical tensions that are restraining investment outside of artificial intelligence and weighing on government finances, a UN agency predicted in a new report.】

item.title: 乌克兰认股权证持有人回击拟议债务交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，乌克兰政府正在努力解决与一群乌克兰认股权证持有人之间的分歧，解决将乌克兰认股权证转换为主权债券的计划问题。【原文：Ukraine’s government is working to resolve differences with a group of holders of its warrants over plans to convert the securities into sovereign bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "明年初 "将宣布美联储新主席人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他计划在 2026 年初宣布美联储领导人的人选，这进一步加剧了人们对美国中央银行下一任领导人的猜测。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to announce his selection to lead the Federal Reserve in early 2026, fueling further speculation about the next leader of the US central bank.】

item.title: 法国米斯特拉尔公司推出新型号，在人工智能竞赛中保持领先地位
item.description: 欧洲领先的人工智能初创公司 Mistral AI 发布了其下一代模型，该公司认为这些模型的适应性比更大的竞争对手 OpenAI 和 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Mistral AI, Europe’s leading artificial intelligence startup, released its next generation of models pitched as more adaptable than alternatives from larger rivals OpenAI and Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: 亿万富翁德拉希反击，抨击 Altice 贷款人
item.description: 周一，法国奥迪斯公司（Altice France）最大的债权人在波尔多附近的拉菲古堡（Château Lafite Rothschild）聚会，为历时一年半的债务重组协议干杯。帕特里克-德雷希（Patrick Drahi）电信帝国其他地区的债券持有人和贷款人却没有那么多理由庆祝。【原文：The largest creditors to Altice France met at Château Lafite Rothschild near Bordeaux on Monday to toast a debt restructuring deal that was one-and-a-half years in the making. Bondholders and lenders in other corners of Patrick Drahi’s telecommunications empire had far less reason to celebrate.】

item.title: 沙特不会让低油价影响支出和借款计划
item.description: 尽管面临油价下跌的挑战，沙特阿拉伯仍计划坚持增加支出和积极借贷，将经济多样化放在王国议程的首位。【原文：Saudi Arabia plans to stick to elevated spending and active borrowing to keep economic diversification at the forefront of the kingdom’s agenda — despite the challenge of lower oil prices.】

item.title: TikTok 和 LinkedIn 面临爱尔兰媒体监管机构的调查
item.description: 爱尔兰媒体监管机构对 TikTok 和 LinkedIn 展开调查，原因是这两家公司的内容报告机制可能存在缺陷。【原文：Ireland’s media regulator opened investigations into TikTok and LinkedIn over potential flaws in their content reporting mechanisms.】

item.title: 信息称，OpenAI 的阿尔特曼敦促推动 "红色代码 "聊天GPT
item.description: 据 Information 报道，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）正在调整内部资源，以加快 ChatGPT 的改进，并宣布出现 "红色代码 "情况，这将延迟其他计划的工作。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman is redirecting internal resources to speed up improvements to ChatGPT, declaring a “code red” situation that will delay work on other initiatives, the Information reported.】

item.title: 韩国议会通过 2026 年预算，推动人工智能引领的增长
item.description: 韩国国会周二批准了 727.9 万亿韩元（约合 4958 亿美元）的明年预算，批准了总统李在明通过积极投资人工智能和其他战略领域来振兴经济的全面计划。【原文：South Korea’s parliament approved a 727.9 trillion won ($495.8 billion) budget for next year on Tuesday, endorsing President Lee Jae Myung’s sweeping plan to revive the economy through aggressive investment in artificial intelligence and other strategic sectors.】

item.title: 亚马逊赶制最新人工智能芯片，与英伟达和谷歌一较高下
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）的云计算部门竞相将其最新版本的人工智能芯片推向市场，再次努力销售能够与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和谷歌公司（Google）的产品相媲美的硬件。【原文：Amazon.com Inc.’s cloud unit raced to get the latest version of its artificial intelligence chip to market, renewing efforts to sell hardware capable of rivaling products from Nvidia Corp. and Google.】

item.title: 美国财政部在首席执行官突然离职一天后再次攻击贡渥集团
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）第二次公开抨击贡渥集团，赞扬桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）决定从该交易商撤资，上个月该交易商被财政部称为克里姆林宫的 "傀儡 "而陷入混乱。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent issued a second public attack on Gunvor Group, praising Banco Santander SA’s decision to pull funding from the trader that was thrown into turmoil last month when his department labeled it a “puppet” of the Kremlin.】

item.title: 美国寻求电力供应，沃尔玛提供备用发电机
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，美国正在寻求利用全国用于数据中心、大卖场和其他地方的大型工业柴油发电机网络，以帮助抑制不断上涨的电力成本，支持人工智能带来的电力需求激增。【原文：The US is looking to tap the nation’s network of large industrial diesel generators used at data centers, big box stores and elsewhere to help curb rising electricity costs and support the surge in power demand from artificial intelligence, according to Energy Secretary Chris Wright.】

item.title: PSP 和 Oaktree 是购买 Hologic 20 亿美元债务的直接贷款人之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大 PSP Investments、Oaktree Capital Management、Franklin Templeton 和其他私人贷款机构抢购了约 20 亿美元的次级债，这些次级债是银行在为 Blackstone Inc. 和 TPG Inc.【原文：Canada’s PSP Investments, Oaktree Capital Management, Franklin Templeton and other private lenders snapped up about $2 billion of subordinated debt that banks had committed to after financing Blackstone Inc. and TPG Inc.’s buyout of Hologic Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 起重机称货币市场资产首次突破 8 万亿美元
item.description: 目前，美国货币市场基金管理的资产规模已超过 8 万亿美元，这是一个具有里程碑意义的行业，由于其高收益率，该行业在投资者中的受欢迎程度直线上升。【原文：US money-market funds now have more than $8 trillion in assets under management, a milestone for an industry that’s skyrocketed in popularity among investors thanks to its lofty yields.】

item.title: 据说 SiTime 正在洽谈收购瑞萨电子的计时部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，模拟芯片制造商 SiTime 公司正在洽谈收购瑞萨电子公司（Renesas Electronics Corp.【原文：Analog chipmaker SiTime Corp., which specializes in chips that keep circuits in sync inside data centers, is in talks to acquire Renesas Electronics Corp.’s timing unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: PlaqueBoyMax 获得格莱美提名，为 Twitch 上的音乐家们画上圆满句号
item.description:
2025年，在亚马逊旗下的直播平台上，标记为 "音乐 "的流媒体增加了10%以上。整个行业都注意到了这一点。【原文：

In 2025, streams tagged as “music” increased over 10% on the Amazon-owned live streaming platform. The industry is taking notice.

】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会（SEC）主席希望通过放宽对小型企业的规定促进首次公开募股
item.description: 美国最高证券监管机构正计划通过削减强制性信息披露和缩减基于公司规模的要求，让小公司更容易上市。【原文：The nation’s top securities regulator is planning to make it easier for small companies to go public by cutting mandatory disclosures and scaling back requirements based on the size of the firm.】

item.title: 强硬派坦桑尼亚领导人将抗议活动归咎于外国势力
item.description: 坦桑尼亚总统萨米亚-苏卢胡-哈桑（Samia Suluhu Hassan）指责外国列强采取殖民主义态度，谴责致命暴力事件破坏了她 10 月份的连任。【原文：Tanzania’s President Samia Suluhu Hassan accused foreign powers of a colonial attitude for condemning deadly violence that marred her re-election in October.】
